summary: Chronicles the motorcycle trip of Ben Tyler as he rides from Toronto to Tofino, British Columbia. Ben stops at landmarks that are both iconic and idiosyncratic on his quest to find meaning in his life.
cast: Joshua Jackson|Peter Spence|Marc Strange|Gage Munroe|Richard Waugh|Deirdre Kirby|Liane Balaban|Fiona Reid|Chuck Shamata|Caroline Cave|Jodi Brooks|Chris Benson|David Reale|Kyle Fairlie|Colin Fox|Jim Codrington|Gord Downie|Gabriel Hogan|Jane Spidell|Fergus Barnes|Chad Nobert|Joel Plaskett|Emm Gryner|Chief Leonard George|Michaela Mann|Ryan Reid|Ulla Friis|Campbell Scott|Ryan Allen|Jim Annan|Grace Lynn Kung|Sherry Nelson|Börje Salming|Marco Soriano
title: One Week
